text: Robert Keith Sawyer is an American Psychologist. He is the Morgan Distinguished Professor in Educational Innovations at University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill. He is an expert on creativity, innovation and learning. ==Books== * * ==Selected publications== * * ==References== ==External links== *Faculty Page at UNC Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Creativity researchers Category:American psychologists Category:University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill faculty
title: Keith Sawyer
